loading

Class AnimatedTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • loading.AnimatedTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AnimatedTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    This class is for binding and using animated textures
    The textures must have the following file structure: [location]\[number of image].png
    The first textures has to have the name 1.png TODO don't make this class serializable TODO implement destroy code
    Author:
    jafi2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
